title: Wtf queu
body: I got a queu for leaving the game because my brother is terribly ill. I love playing LoL but, they won't response how sad. I'm really mad and disappointed.

replies.body:
The [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) won't give you a low-priority queue for a single match, as we understand that sometimes emergencies happen. It takes a trend of leaves before you'll be put in an LPQ for leaving. 

If you're experiencing technical issues that are causing you to disconnect from matches, please let me know so I can assist you in resolving it.
